name: <Project Raid>
description:
A 4-PLAYER BRAWLER TO BASH, DASH, AND SLASH YOUR WAY TO VICTORY!

Join the brawl as one of the 4 fighting clans; bashing opponents off the map and fighting become the one to invoke the giant (albeit silly) monsters!
NOTE: Currently requires 4 Players and Gamepads to Play!

Includes 3 Game Modes:

  • Free-For-All - Last fighter standing, wins! Give it all you got!
  • Team Battle - Clan fighters come in Pairs! Gain more points based on total survivors!
  • Cursed - Pass the Curse to another Player before the time runs out...and then...!?

As part of a 3rd year student project to create a short but polished arcade game. Find out more on our Student Game Site!

We'd love to hear your thoughts. Leave us some Christmas feedback!
